New Records: Emmanuel Clase has tied Cody Allen for 1st on the Guardians all-time pitcher saves list with 149.

Will Brennan has reached 200 hits in his career.
Key Match Events: The Guardians needed to win by 2 runs or more to cover the spread. They did cover.
The over/under was 8 and the teams scored 12 runs, so people who bet the over won.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Vinnie Pasquantino has set his career high with 4 hits.
